PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CableCarrierSegmentTypeDropper
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties that are applicable to a type or an occurrence of dropper.

PropertyDef.Name: CurrentCarryingCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum value of electric current which can be carried continuously by a conductor, a device or an apparatus, under specified conditions without its steady-state temperature exceeding a specified value. Based on IEC60826-11-13. NOTE: The temperature specified value is maximum Design Ambient Temperature.

PropertyDef.Name: TensileStrength
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the ability to withstand breakage apart under applied force.

PropertyDef.Name: AssemblyInstruction
PropertyDef.Definition: Instructions to describe how the system / equipment / facility is assembled.

PropertyDef.Name: IsRigid
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication of whether the conduit is rigid (= TRUE) or flexible (= FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: UltimateTensileStrength
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the maximum stress that a material or element can withstand before breaking while being stretched or pulled.

PropertyDef.Name: IsAdjustable
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the element is adjustable or not.

PropertyDef.Name: IsCurrentCarrying
PropertyDef.Definition: To indicate whether the current will go through the dropper.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalLoad
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal load that a component can support.
